lug: Besigye alina endowooza y'emu wabula akkiriza nti obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka mu kulonda bulina kuba bwa mbagirawo.
mt0: <pad> Besigye agrees but believes that the need for change in the election process should be a principle.</s>

en: I agree with Otunnu in principle but side with Besigye on the matter of practical politics.
lug: Nzikiriziganya ne Otunnu mu buntu wabula ate nzikiriziganya ne Besigye mu nsonga z'ebyobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> I agree with Otunny in friendship but I disagree with Besigye in politics.</s>

en: Otunnu does not appreciate the hard choices the opposition is faced with.
lug: Otunnu tasiima okusalawo okuzibu oludda oluvuganya kwe lusanga.
mt0: <pad> The Ugandan leader did not like the decision to silence his rival party.</s>

en: The opposition will now have a platform to register its grievances and demands before the wider Ugandan public.
lug: Oludda oluvuganya kati lujja kuba n'oluwenda okulaga obutali bumativu bwalwo n'ebyetaago byalwo nga tebinnatuuka eri Bannayuganda.
mt0: <pad> The opposition party will now have the opportunity to show its frustrations and needs before they can be communicated to the people of Uganda.</s>

en: It will give President Museveni an opportunity to run a one man show.
lug: Kijja kuwa pulezidenti Museveni omukisa obutavuganyizibwa.
mt0: <pad> It will give President Museveni a huge blessing.</s>

en: I often find most freedom and accountability activists in Uganda missing in this important communication.
lug: Emirundi egisinga eddembe n'abalwanirizi b'eddembe mu Uganda bafiirwa okuwuliziganya okulungi
mt0: <pad> Most of the cities and activists for peace in Uganda have lost communication.</s>

en: I made this point during the Temangalo debate.
lug: Nayogera ku nsonga eno mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Temangalo.
mt0: <pad> I discussed this issue in a discussion on the Internet.</s>

en: The procurement process in the National Social Security Fund was full of changes.
lug: Enteekateeka y'okugula ebintu mu National Social Security Fund yali ejjudde okukyusibwa
mt0: <pad> The National Social Security Fund's acquisition plan was almost completely overhauled.</s>

en: It was better to hold the fund to account for delivering five thousand cheap houses in Temangalo and hang Amama Mbabazi later.
lug: Kyali kisingako okulindako okussa ssente ku akaawunti ez'okuwaayo ku mayumba enkumi ttaano aga layisi e Temangalo oluvannyuma Amama Mbabazi awanikibwe.
mt0: <pad> It was better to put money into loans for the 50 lay-is houses in Temngalo after Ms Mbabazi was arrested.</s>

en: The naive and emotional gossiping classes of Kampala were swayed by their personal desires.
lug: Abatalina kye bamanyi n'abengambo mu Kampala buzunga nga beenoonyeza byabwe.
mt0: <pad> Without knowledge and understanding of the language, the Ugandans in Kampala are busy making their own money.</s>

en: We lost both ways, the project failed and Mbabazi was not punished.
lug: Twafiirwa mu ngeri zombi, pulojekiti yafa ne Mbabazi teyabonerezebwa.
mt0: <pad> We lost two ways, the project died and Mabazi was not honoured.</s>

en: Uganda's opposition has huge technological and economic opportunities that it can build on to defeat Museveni.
lug: Oludda oluvuganya mu Uganda lulina tekinologiya n'ebyenfuna bingi bye lusobola okukozesa okuwangula Museveni.
mt0: <pad> The opposition in Uganda has many technology and resources that it can use to topple Museveni.</s>

en: The opposition has grown its base from twenty four percent of the vote in 1996 to forty one percent in the last election.
lug: Oludda oluvuganya lwongedde ku bululu okuva ku bitundu abiri mu bina ku kikumi mu 1996 okutuuka ku bitundu ana mu kimu ku kikumi mu kulonda okuwedde.
mt0: <pad> The opposition party increased its share of the vote from two percent in 1996 to four percent in the last election.</s>

en: Uganda should have a perfect election process.
lug: Uganda erina okuba n'okulonda okulungi ennyo.
mt0: <pad> Uganda has to have a very good election.</s>

en: Karl Popper in his book, Conjectures and Refutations, offered the best insight.
lug: Karl Popper mu kitabo kye, Conjectures and Refutations, yaggyayo amakulu agasinga.
mt0: <pad> Karl Popper in his book, Conjectures and Refutations, took out many of the main ideas.</s>

en: It is unlikely that Uganda can get a free and fair election today.
lug: Si kyangu nti Uganda esobola okubeera n'akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya leero.
mt0: <pad> It is not easy for Uganda to have a fair and just election today.</s>

en: Otunnu had a passionate desire with digging out the past of Luwero and the Northern War.
lug: Otunnu yalina obwagazi bw'okumalawo ebyali bimanyiddwa ku Luwero n'olutalo lw'omu bukiikakkono.
mt0: <pad> Otunnu had the ambition to end the knowledge of Luwero and the war in the north.</s>

en: America was involved in an endless debate on slavery.
lug: America yeenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okutakoma ku buddu.
mt0: <pad> America joined the debate on the cessation of hostilities.</s>

en: Majority of Ugandan voters are between the ages of eighteen and thirty.
lug: Bannayuganda abalonzi abasinga bali wakati w'emyaka kkumi na munaana n'asatu.
mt0: <pad> Most Ugandan voters are between the ages of 18 and 30.</s>

en: They were too young to care about what happened in Luwero.
lug: Baali bato nnyo okufaayo kw'ebyo ebyaliwo e Luwero.
mt0: <pad> Many people were very shocked at what happened in Luwero.</s>

en: Making Luwero an electoral issue in 2010 meant discussing issues that interest 1% of voters.
lug: Okufuula Luwero ensonga y'ebyokulonda mu 2010 kyategeeza kuteesa nsonga ezisikiriza 1% ez'abalonzi.
mt0: <pad> The making of Luwero a campaign issue in 2010 meant that it could raise concerns for over 1% of the voters.</s>

en: People in northern Uganda have suffered a million and one injustices under Museveni's rule.
lug: Abantu mu Bukiikakkono bwa Uganda babonyeebonye n'obutali bw'enkanya emirundi akakadde kamu wansi w'obukulembeze bwa Museveni.
mt0: <pad> The people of Northern Uganda have been victims of injustice over a million times under the rule of Museveni.</s>

en: Andrew Mwenda is the founder and owner of the independent news magazine.
lug: Andrew Mwenda ye mutandisi era nannyini magazini ya Independent news.
mt0: <pad> Andrew Mwenda is a journalist and editor of the Independent News.</s>

en: Joseph Ocheng is a Ugandan journalist born in Kotido district, nothern Uganda.
lug: Joseph Ocheng munnamawulire munnayuganda eyazaalibwa mu disitulikiti y'e Kotido mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Joseph Ocheng is a journalist from Uganda.</s>

en: Otunnu does not seem to understand the difficult choices to be made by the opposition.
lug: Otunnu alabika obutategeera kusalawo kuzibu oludda oluvuganya kwe lulina okukola.
mt0: <pad> The failure to understand the problem is a failure to understand what the political party should do.</s>

en: According to the Independent issue of September 17-23, 2010, Mubatsi stated that election chaos threatened to obstruct the NRM primaries.
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent ensonga z'omwezi Gwomwenda 17-23 2010, Mubatsi yagamba nti obukuubagano mu by'okulonda byatiisa okulemesa akamyufu ka NRM
mt0: <pad> According to the Independent on September 17-23 2010, Mubatsi said that election violence was a way to weaken the NRM's power.</s>

en: Gideon Badagamawa, an expert on environment and natural resources, explains that plastic is non biodegradable hence affets soils.
lug: Gideon Badagamawa, omukugu mu byobutonde bw'ensi, annyonnyola nti ebintu ebya pulasitiika tebivunda nga n'olw'ekyo bikosa ettaka.
mt0: <pad> Gideon Badagamawa, a scientist in the field of Earth science, explains that plastic materials don't decompose and therefore affect the earth.</s>

en: Badagamawa says over fifty percent imports of food come to Africa, not because we cannot produce food but because our soils have degenerated because they are chocked with plastics.
lug: Badagamawa agamba nti emmere etundibwa mu Afirika esukka mu bitundu ataano ku kikumi, sso lwa nsonga nti tetusobola kwerimira mmere wabula kubanga ettaka lyaffe liddiridde olw'okwonoonebwa ebintu ebya pulaasitiika.
mt0: <pad> Badagamawa says that the food exported in Africa is over fifty percent, not because we can't produce food but because our land is spoiled by plastic pollution.</s>

en: Badagamawa says that well managed recycling programs can reduce pollution.
lug: Badagamawa agamba nti enteekateeka y'okusaanuusa ebintu ekendeeza ku butonde okwonooneka.
mt0: <pad> Badagamawa says that the process of reusing materials increases the environmental destruction.</s>

en: In poor countries like Uganda, reducing plastic usage is not an easy task.
lug: Mu mawanga amaavu nga Uganda, okukendeeza okukozesa ebyapulaasitiika si mulimu mwangu.
mt0: <pad> In poor countries like Uganda, reducing plastic use is not an easy task.</s>

en: Uganda manufactures warned that banning plastics, which are largely used for packaging, would increase costs of production.
lug: Abakola ebyamaguzi mu Uganda baalabula nti okuwera ebintu ebya pulaasitiika ebisinga okukozesebwa kusabika ebyamaguzi kyandifuula okufulumya ebyamaguzi okw'obuseere.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan importers have warned that the shortage of plastic bags used to pack goods could lead to the export of cheap goods.</s>

en: It would also increase prices of consumer goods.
lug: Era kyandirinnyisa n'emiwendo abantu kwe bagulira ebyamaguzi.
mt0: <pad> And it's very surprising to see the number of people buying goods.</s>

en: Uganda Plastic Manufacturers and Recycling Association intend to continue to lobby the government for support.
lug: Uganda Plastic Manufacturers and Recycling Association biruubirira okwongera okusaba gavumenti okukiyambako.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda Plastic Manufacturers and Recycling Association is planning to continue to ask the government for support.</s>

en: Lukwiya revealed that Acaye Ecomog sent his six children to government and is being urged to come out and look after his children.
lug: Lukwiya yagamba nti Acaye Ecomog yasindika abaana be omukaaga eri Gavumenti kyokka era akoowoolwa okuvaayo alabirire abaana be.
mt0: <pad> Lukwiya said that Acaye Ecomog sent his eight children to the government only and was ordered to leave the country to look after his children.</s>

en: Lotiba was instructed to deploy soldiers to attack Sudan People's Liberation Army camps and loot food.
lug: Lotiba yalagirwa okuyiwa abasirikale okulumba enkambi z'eggye lya Sudan People's Liberation Army balinyageyo emmere.
mt0: <pad> Lotiba was ordered to send troops to take over the camps of the Sudan People's Liberation Army and steal food.</s>

en: Otti claimed that he checked the area where he got in contact with Uganda Peoples Defence Forces.
lug: Otti agamba nti yakebedde ekifo we yakwataganira n'eggye lya Uganda erya Uganda Peoples Defence Forces.
mt0: <pad> Otti says he searched the area where he was captured and spoke to the Ugandan People's Defence Forces.</s>

en: Otti bragged that Uganda Peoples Defence Forces has paid him salary indirectly.
lug: Otti yeewaana nti Uganda Peoples Defence Forces emusasudde okusaala mu ngeri etali ya mu mpeke.
mt0: <pad> Otti claimed that the Ugandan People's Defence Forces (UPDF) forced him to work in a non-food way.</s>

en: Otti suspected Okulu's squad to be the one which attacked a location in Madi.
lug: Otti yateebereza nti ekibinja kya Okulu kye kyalumba enkambi y'e Madi.
mt0: <pad> Otti suspected that the Okulu group attacked the Madi camp.</s>

en: Lukwiya reported that Okulu Ben met Labongo and they separated some days back.
lug: Lukwiya yagamba nti Okulu Ben yasisinkana ne Labongo ne baawukana mu nnaku eziyise emabega.
mt0: <pad> Lukwiya said that Ben O'Sullivan met and dated Labongo in the past.</s>

en: Kapere met Lagulu across undisclosed river today.
lug: Kapere yasisinkana Lagulu ku mugga ogutamanyiddwa leero.
mt0: <pad> Kapere met the chief today at a meeting that was not announced.</s>

en: Labongo reported that he is trying to meet Okuti after getting information that his and Okuti's squads met in undisclosed location.
lug: Labongo yagambanti yali agezaako okusisinkana Okuti oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubaka nti enkabi ye n'eya Okuti zaasisinkanako mu kifo ekitamanyiddwa.
mt0: <pad> Labongo said he was trying to contact Okuti after receiving information that his troops and the Okuti's had met in a unknown location.</s>

en: Dominic instructed Okuti to move with the entire group to join him after meeting.
lug: Dominic yalagira Okuti atambule n'ekibinja kyonna bamusisinkane oluvannyuma lw'olukiiko.
mt0: <pad> Dominic advised Okuti to travel with the whole team and meet him after the meeting.</s>

en: Ocan Bunia revealed that his medical condition is deteriorating and commented that he has put it in God's hands.
lug: Ocan Bunia yategeezezza nti obulamu bwe bwali bugenda bukendeera n'agamba nti yali abutadde mu mikono gya Katonda.
mt0: <pad> Ocan Bunia told the BBC that his life was in danger and he had put it in God's hands.</s>

en: Angola reported to Kony that Uganda Peoples Defence Forces attacked him and among the dead is a captain.
lug: Angola yaloopera Kony nti Uganda Peoples Defence Forces yamulumba n'emuttira abalwanyi omuli ne kkapiteeni.
mt0: <pad> Angola accused Kony of attacking the Ugandan People's Defence Forces and killing soldiers including a captain.</s>

en: In reaction to Kony's orders, Angola reported clearly that he failed to control Acaye Ecomog.
lug: Mu kwanukula ebiragiro bya Kony, Angola yamunnyonnyola lwatu nti yali alemeddwa okufuga Acaye Ecomog.
mt0: <pad> In a response to Kony's instructions, Angola explained why he had been unable to take over Acaye Ecomog.</s>

en: The news of Acaye Ecomog and Angola's reaction to Kony's orders to command other commanders, has put Kony in another state of confusion.
lug: Amawulire g'ebyakoleddwa Acaye ne Angola ku biragiro bya Kony okuduumira abaduumizi abalala kitadde Kony mu kutabulwatabulwa okulala.
mt0: <pad> The news of the actions in Ghana and Angola on Kony's proposals to appoint other ambassadors has pushed Kony into other political disputes.</s>

en: It is a big sign of loss of command and control on Kony's side.
lug: Kabonero kanene akalaga nti Kony takyali mu mitambo era takyasobola kufuga mbeera.
mt0: <pad> The huge sign that Kony was out of the game and out of control.</s>

en: We expect Kony to harass and use Lukwiya as his army commander to arrest that situation.
lug: Tusuubira Kony okuyisa obubi Lukwiya ng'omuduumizi we ow'amagye okukkakkanya embeera eyo.
mt0: <pad> We expect Kony to take advantage of his position as the commander of the army to rectify the situation.</s>

en: Kony's prescriptions to Ocan Bunia's disease looks a gamble.
lug: Engeri Kony gy'annyonnyolamu endwadde ya Ocan Bunia erabika ng'ey'obulimba.
mt0: <pad> The way Kony describes Ocan Bunia disease seems to be a hoax.</s>

en: If his commanders who are already with questionable loyalty take note of Ocan Bunia's disease, it could increase their negative attitude.
lug: Singa abaduumizi be abaali batankanibwa obwesimbu bwabwe bamanya ku bulwadde bwa Ocan Bunia, kyandiyongedde ku butafaayo bwabwe.
mt0: <pad> If his residents who were denied their identity had learned about Ocan Bunia, it would have added to their history.</s>

en: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces should be informed of Angola's stand, so his position could be constantly attacked to destroy his morale.
lug: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces lirina okumanyisibwa ku ndowooza ya Angola, okulaba ng'endowooza ye ekolokotebwa buli kiseera akiveeko.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Defence Forces must be informed of the position of Angola, to ensure that his position is re-assessed every time he leaves.</s>

en: UPDF propaganda desk should exploit Kony's guesswork on prescribing the various medicine for Ocan Bunia which have not worked.
lug: Abatambuza abawulire agataliiko bukakafu ba UPDF balina okusaabulula ennyinyonnyola y'eddagala lya Ocan Bunia ennyingirire Kony gy'azze akozesa nga n'okukola tekola.
mt0: <pad> UPDF whistleblowers should be able to explain the chemical composition of Ocan Bunia, the drug Kony has been using and not doing anything.</s>

en: Opio Makas was directed to fragment his and Lotiba's force into smaller groups to avoid Uganda Peoples Defence Forces pursuit.
lug: Opio Makas ne Lotiba baalagirwa okukutula mu bibinja byabwe bufuuke obubinja obutono beewale Uganda Peoples Defence Forces okubagwa mu buwufu.
mt0: <pad> Opio Makas and Lotiba were ordered to split their troops into smaller groups and fight the Uganda People's Defence Forces.</s>

en: If Makas does what he has been told, he will reach safely especially now that it is too bushy for the gunship to observe well.
lug: Makas bw'akola nga bw'alagiddwa, ajja kutuuka mirembe naddala nga kati ensiko ekuze nga kizibu bamukwatammundu okulaba obulungi.
mt0: <pad> If Makas does as he was instructed, he will find peace especially since the beard is now so large that it's difficult for the observers to see well.</s>

en: Makas was reminded that Equatoria Defence Force are also potential enemies of Lords Resistance Army.
lug: Makas yajjukiziddwa nti Equatoria Defence Force nayo yali esobola okuba omulabe wa Lords Resistance Army.
mt0: <pad> Makas was reminded that the Equatoria Defence Force could also be a enemy of Lords Resistance Army.</s>

en: Kony stated clearly that these days he does not trust his soldiers because their minds are mixed up and believes that's why they are escaping.
lug: Kony yakyogera mu lwatu nti ennaku zino takyesiga bajaasi be kubanga endowooza zaabwe zitabuddwatabuddwa era y'ensonga lwaki batoloka.
mt0: <pad> Kony told the crowd that he no longer trusts his men because their ideas have been changed and that's why they are leaving.</s>

en: Lukwiya could not get Kony clearly when he asked him his plans now that Lukwiya is near the border.
lug: Lukwiya teyategeera bulungi Kony bwe yamubuuza ku enteekateeka ze naddala nga Lukwiya asemberedde ensalo.
mt0: <pad> When Kony asked Lukwago about his plans, Lukwago didn't understand well.</s>

en: Kony ordered Lukwiya to cross the border.
lug: Kony yalagira Lukwiya okusala ensalo.
mt0: <pad> Kony ordered Lukwiya to make the marriage.</s>

en: Labongo reported that he met Okuti Okello.
lug: Labongo yategeeza nti yasisinkana Okuti Okello.
mt0: <pad> Labongo told the BBC that he met Okuti Okello.</s>

en: Okuti was intercepted by Uganda Peoples Defence Forces while he was coming from ambush.
lug: Okuti yataataaganyizibwa Uganda Peoples Defence Forces bwe yali akomawo okuva mu bulumbaganyi.
mt0: <pad> He was captured by the Uganda People's Defence Forces when he returned from the war.</s>

en: One of the officers who is a son of Labongo's aunt died with three others.
lug: Omu ku boofiisa eyali mutabani wa ssenga wa Labongo yafa n'abalala basatu.
mt0: <pad> One of the chiefs, son of the king of Labongo, died with three others.</s>

en: Labongo narrated that Ayoli is talking on the Frequency Modulation radios.
lug: Labongo yanyumya nti Ayoli ayogera ku leediyo za FM.
mt0: <pad> Labongo told me that Ayoade was speaking on FM radio.</s>

en: Lotiba reported that he heard some gunshots about a kilometer from his location.
lug: Lotiba yagamba nti yawulira ebyasi nga bibwatuka kiromita ng'emu okuva we yali.
mt0: <pad> Lotiba said he heard the voices of the beasts about a kilometer away from where he was.</s>

en: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces have gone back to their base.
lug: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces ezzeeyo mu nkambi yaayo.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda Peoples Defence Forces have returned to their base.</s>

en: The UPC party president Dr. Olara Otunnu announced the party's withdrawal from Interparty Cooperation on August thirtieth.
lug: Pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya UPC Dr. Olara Otunnu yalangirira okuva kw'ekibiina mu omukago ogugatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi nga asatu Ogwomunaana.
mt0: <pad> The President of the UPC Dr. Olara Otunnu announced the withdrawal of the organization from the inter-party conference on Wednesday.</s>

en: He said the Uganda People's Congress position was not to take part in an election.
lug: Yagamba nti Uganda People's Congress teyali ya kwetaba mu kulonda.
mt0: <pad> He said that the Uganda People's Congress would not participate in the election.</s>

en: Otunnu restated this position during a media briefing last week.
lug: Otunnu yaddamu okwogera ensonga y'emu bwe yali ayogerako eri bannamawulire wiiki ewedde.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: He said that there was widespread election violence in the recent National Resistance Movement primaries.
lug: Yagamba nti waaliwo obumenyi bw'amateeka bungi mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> He said there was a lot of legal knowledge in the National Resistance Movement.</s>

en: Information from inside Uganda People's Congress shows that Otunnu could be facing a near riot within its own party.
lug: Amawulire okuva mu nsonda ez'omunda mu Uganda People's Congress galaga nti Otunnu kirabika yalina obukuubagano bungi munda mu kibiina kye.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan sources in the Uganda People's Congress say that Omunna seems to have had many internal fights within his party.</s>

en: Yona Kanyomoozi is a former Minister of Cooperatives and Marketing in the Obote two regime from one thousand eighty to eighty five.
lug: Yona Kanyomoozi yaliko minisita w'obwegassi n'obutale mu gavumenti ya Obote eyookubiri okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana okutuuka mu kinaana mu etaano.
mt0: <pad> Yona Kanyomoozi was the minister of trade and industry in the second Obote government from 2008 to 2009.</s>

en: He says he will stand as an independent candidate in Ntungamo in next year's elections.
lug: Agamba nti ajja kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina ku ky'omubaka wa Ntungamo mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogujja.
mt0: <pad> He said he will run for the parliamentary seat of the House of Commons in the next election.</s>

en: Kanyomozi was also a candidate in the March Uganda People's Congress party presidential elections.
lug: Kanyomozi era yavuganya ku kya Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress mu kulonda okwaliwo mu Gwokusatu.
mt0: <pad> Kanyomozi also ran for president of the Uganda People's Congress in the election held in March.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress withdrawal from the Inter Party Cooperation was a huge mistake which is likely to kill the party.
lug: Uganda People's Congress okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi yali nsobi nnene ekiyinza n'okusuula ekibiina.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress from the political party conference was a major problem for power and the dissolution of the assembly.</s>

en: He says it would be yet another big error not to participate in the two thousand eleven general elections.
lug: Agamba nti era yandiba ensobi ennene ssinga ekibiina tekyetaba mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi mu gumu.
mt0: <pad> He said that he would also have made a great mistake if the conference had not participated in the 2010 general election.</s>

en: Otunnu is behaving like Obote did in one thousand nine hundred ninety four.
lug: Otunnu yeeyisa nga Obote bwe yakola mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu ena.
mt0: <pad> Otunny acted like Obote in 1994.</s>

en: Only five people from the Uganda People's Congress were in that assembly.
lug: Bannakibiina kya Uganda People's Congress bataano bokka be baali mu lukungaana.
mt0: <pad> Five members of the Uganda People's Congress were present at the meeting.</s>

en: Otunnu is doing what Obote did by pulling out of the Inter Party Cooperation, which is also a very big mistake.
lug: Otunnu akola Obote kye yakola bwe yava mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, nga nayo nsobi nnene.
mt0: <pad> When Obote left the assembly, he made a big mistake.</s>

en: My supporters have urged me to stand for the Ntungamo Municipality parliamentary seat and I can not let them down.
lug: Abawagizi bange bansabye nneesimbewo ku kifo ky'omubaka wa Munisipaali y'e Ntungamo mu Paalamenti era sisobola kubayiwa.
mt0: <pad> My supporters asked me to stand for the position of a Member of the Legislative Assembly of the Central District and I could not say no.</s>

en: I am going to stand as an independent and as a Uganda People's Congress because that is where I belong.
lug: Ngenda kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina era ng'owa Uganda People's Congress kubanga kye kibiina mwe nva.
mt0: <pad> I'm going to stand for the presidency and as a member of the Uganda People's Congress because that's my party.</s>

en: Inside sources said former UPC presidential contenders Jimmy Akena, Joseph Ochieno and Henry Mayega will contest in two thousand eleven.
lug: Ensonda ez'omunda zaategeezezza nti abaavuganyaako ku ky'obwapulezidenti wa UPC omuli; Jimmy Akena, Joseph Ochieno ne Henry Mayega baakuvuganya mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.
mt0: <pad> Sources from the UPC said that the three contenders for the presidency of the UPC; Jimmy Akena, Joseph Ochieno and Henry Mayega will be debating on November 22nd.</s>

en: By the time of filing this story, Ochieno was reportedly upcountry campaigning.
lug: Mu kiseera emboozi eno we yamalirizibwa, kigambibwa nti Ochieno nti yali mu byalo ng'akuyega balonzi.
mt0: <pad> When the plot was finished, Ochieno was said to be in the countryside recruiting voters.</s>

en: Sospater Akwenyu is the chairman Uganda People's Congress Kaberamaido district.
lug: Sospater Akwenyu ye ssentebe wa Uganda People's Congress mu disitulikiti y'e Kaberamaido.
mt0: <pad> Sospater Akwenyu is the chairman of the Uganda People's Congress in the district of Kaberamaido.</s>

en: "We have another Congressman Alfred Ewatu who wants to stand so I stepped down for him," said Akwenyu.
lug: Tulina munnakibiina omulala Alfred Ewatu ayagala okuvuganya, n'olw'ekyo navuddemu ne nkimulekera, Akwenyu bwe yagamba.
mt0: <pad> We have another member of the board Alfred Ewatu who wants to run, so I decided to let him run," Akwenyu said.</s>

en: Uganda People Congress will participate in the general elections or maintain its boycott stand, Akwenyu said.
lug: Akwenyu yagamba nti Uganda People Congress ejja kwetaba mu kulonda kwa bonna bwe kitaba ekyo ejja kukusibira ekikookolo.
mt0: <pad> Akwenyu said that the Uganda People Congress will participate in any election and if it does not, it will be a threat to you.</s>

en: We shall tell the people of Uganda our position when we have reached the bridge.
lug: Tujja kutegeeza Bannayuganda kye tusibiddeko nga tumaze okusalawo.
mt0: <pad> We will inform the people of Uganda about our decision after we have made our decision.</s>

en: Akwenyu serves on Otunnu's cabinet.
lug: Akwenyu aweereza ku kabineeti ya Otunnu.
mt0: <pad> Akwenyu is a member of the cabinet of the Prime Minister.</s>

en: In the Independent last week, Otunnu said that Uganda People's Congress had encountered a fork in the road.
lug: Mu Independent wa wiiki ewedde, Otunnu yategeeza nti Uganda People's Congress kyali kisanze akaseera akazibu mu kusalawo.
mt0: <pad> In the Independent of last week, Otunju reported that the Uganda People's Congress had been in a difficult time in making decisions.</s>

en: Some members from Uganda People's Congress disobeyed the directive of the party President Milton Obote in one thousand nine hundred eighty nine.
lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana mu mwenda, Bammemba ba Uganda People's Congress abamu baava ku kiragiro ky'eyali Pulezidenti w'ekibiina Milton Obote.
mt0: <pad> In 1848, some members of the Uganda People's Congress resigned under the order of the then President of the Conference Milton Obote.</s>

en: Two weeks after the March Uganda People's Congress party presidential elections, appointments made by Otunnu were rejected.
lug: Bwe waayitawo wiiki bbiri ng'okulonda kw'ekibiina okw'okulonda Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress okwa Ogwokusatu kuwedde, abantu abaalondebwa Otunnu bonna baagaanibwa.
mt0: <pad> When two weeks after the election of the Uganda People's Congress on March, all the people elected in the November polls were refused.</s>

en: They both questioned why Otunnu had made the appointments without consulting them.
lug: Bombi beebuuza lwaki Otunnu yali alonze abakulembeze abapya nga tamaze kubeebuuzaako.
mt0: <pad> Bombi wondered why the president had appointed new leaders without consulting them.</s>

en: Sources say that the growing rebellion against Otunnu in the Uganda People's Congress stems from his association with the anti Obote faction.
lug: Ensonda zigamba nti okuwakanya okungi eri Otunnu mu Uganda People's Congress kiviira ddala ku nkolagana ye n'abantu abatatambulira ku nkola za Obote.
mt0: <pad> Sources say that the opposition to Otunny in the Uganda People's Congress is mainly due to his coordination with the people who did not follow Obote's policies.</s>

en: This faction is the gang of four that controls the Milton Obote Foundation and the investment wing of the Uganda People's Congress.
lug: Akakundi kano ke k'abantu bana abafuga Milton Obote Foundation era akateekateeka okusiga ensimbi mu Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> The committee is made up of four people who manage the Milton Obote Foundation and is planning to invest in the Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: It is said that this gang supported Otunnu to take the Uganda People's Congress presidency.
lug: Kigambibwa nti akabinja kano kaawagira Otunnu okwesimbawo ku ky'obwapulezidenti bwa Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> It is reported that the group supported Otunhu in his bid for the presidency of the Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: Kanyomoozi shares the view that Otunnu's problems stem from his links with the Gang of Four.
lug: Kanyomoozi agamba nti ebizibu bwa Otunnu busibuka ku nkolagana ye n'akabondo k'abantu bana.
mt0: <pad> Kanyomoozi says that the problems of Otunnu are a result of his relationship with his family of four.</s>

en: Otunnu is under intensive pressure from a group known in Uganda People's Congress circles as the gang of four.
lug: Otunnu ali ku bwerinde obuva ku kabinja akamanyikiddwa nga ganga of four Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni has been elected as the president of four Uganda People's Congresses.</s>

en: Mindra was the corporation secretary of the Milton Obote Foundation.
lug: Mindra ye yali omuwandiisi ow'ekyama owa Milton Obote Foundation.
mt0: <pad> Mindra was the executive director of the Milton Obote Foundation.</s>

en: They are uncontrollably against the Obote family.
lug: Tebagambwako bwe kituuka ku kukuubagana ne famire ya Obote.
mt0: <pad> They were not known when they came to make peace with the Obote family.</s>

en: The gang succeeded in defeating the Obote family as represented by Jimmy Akena at Nambole during the UPC presidential elections.
lug: Akabinja kano kaawangula famire ya Obote bwe yali ekiikiriddwa Jimmy Akena mu kulonda kwa Pulezidenti wa UPC e Nambole.
mt0: <pad> The group defeated the Obote family when it was represented by Jimmy Akena in the Nambole UPC presidential election.</s>

en: Walubiri, one of the said gang of four, did not cut up words in expressing his opposition to the Obotes.
lug: Walubiri, omu ku bagambibwa okuba mu kabinja k'abana, teyaluma mu bigambo bye bwe yali ayogera ng'alaga nga bw'atawagira bali ku ludda lwa famire ya Obote.
mt0: <pad> Walubiri, one of the boys who were allegedly in the childhood camp, was not afraid to speak out when he showed his support for the Obote family.</s>

en: Our problem started when some of Obote's family members thought leadership in the party was by succession which we opposed on principle.
lug: Obuzibu bwaffe bwava ku mbeera nti abamu ku bava mu famire ya Obote bwe baalowooza nti obukulembeze mu kibiina bwali bwansikirano ekintu kye twawakanyiza ddala.
mt0: <pad> Our problem was that some of the Obote family members thought that the leadership of the party was transferred, something we strongly denied.</s>

en: Similar groups emerged in the one thousand nine hundred sixties after independence.
lug: Ebibinja ebirala byamerukawo mu myaka gya lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga oluvannyuma lw'ameefuga.
mt0: <pad> Other bands formed in the 1980s after the independence.</s>

en: It also involved pro and anti Obote forces within Uganda People's Congress.
lug: Era kyalimu abaali bawagira n'abatawagira Obote mu Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> Era was a coalition of supporters and opponents of Obote in the Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: Opposing Democratic Party lost key constituencies to rival parties by Dicta Asiimwe.
lug: Ekibiina ekyali kivuganya ekya Democratic Party kyawangulwa mu konsityuwensi ez'enkizo eri ekibiina bwe byali ku mbiranye ekya Dicta Asiimwe.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party was defeated in the conventions of the party that was in power.</s>

en: The Democratic Party Secretary General Mathias Nsubuga is defiant.
lug: Ssaabawandiisi wa Democratic Party Mathias Nsubuga mugugubi.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party's Secretary General Mathias Nsubuga is in the hospital.</s>

en: He courageously says Democratic Party will take over state power in the two thousand eleven general elections.
lug: Mu buvumu agamba nti Democratic Party ya kutwala obuyinza mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.
mt0: <pad> He said in a statement that the Democratic Party will win power in the 2012 general election.</s>

en: Nsubuga says the Democratic Party President Norbert Mao commands the highest appeal to the youth.
lug: Nsubuga agamba nti Pulezidenti wa Democratic Party, Norbert Mao awulirirwamu nnyo abavubuka.
mt0: <pad> Nsubuga said that the president of the Democratic Party, Norbert Mao is popular with young people.</s>

en: Nsubuga's claims appear to be at variance with the events on September thirty first.
lug: Ebigambo bya Nsubuga byafaanana ng'ebituufu bw'ogeraageranya ku byaliwo nga asatu mu lumu mu Gwomwenda.
mt0: <pad> The words of Nsubuga seemed to be true when compared to what happened on March 3.</s>

en: Ssuubi has absorbed many members of Democratic Party.
lug: Ssuubi etutte bammemba ba Democratic Party bangi.
mt0: <pad> The rumors have angered many members of the Democratic Party.</s>

en: Prior to the two thousand six general elections, Democratic Party was the king maker in Kampala.
lug: Ng'okulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga tekunnatuuka, Democratic Party ye yali esinga amaanyi mu Kampala.
mt0: <pad> Before the general election of 2008, the Democratic Party was the dominant party in Kampala.</s>

en: In that year's election, Charles Musoke Sserunjogi was replaced by Godfrey Nyakaana as Kampala Central division chairperson.
lug: Mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogwo, Charles Musoke Sserunjogi yasuulibwa n'asikizibwa Godfrey Nyakaana nga ssentebe wa divizoni ya Kampala Central.
mt0: <pad> In the same year's elections, Charles Musoke Sserunjogi was removed and replaced by Godfrey Nyakaana as the president of the Central Division of Kampala.</s>

en: The mayorship went to Hajji Nasser Sebaggala.
lug: Obwammeeya bwatwalibwa Hajji Nasser Sebaggala.
mt0: <pad> The chairmanship was held by Hajji Nasser Sebaggala.</s>

en: Deo Kijjambu was the Democratic Party Kampala district treasurer.
lug: Deo Kijjambu ye yali omuwanika wa Democratic Party mu disitulikiti ya Kampala.
mt0: <pad> Deo Kijjambu was the Democratic Party's representative for the district of Kampala.</s>

en: Erias Lukwago captured the Kampala Central Member of Parliament seat from Francis Babu.
lug: Erias Lukwago yawangula eky'omubaka wa Kampala Central mu Paalamenti ng'adda mu bigere bya Francis Babu.
mt0: <pad> Erias Lukwago won the parliamentary seat of Kampala Central in the election of Ugandan MP Francis Babu.</s>

en: Today Democratic Party leads in only two divisions out of the five.
lug: We butuukidde olwaleero nga Democratic Party ekulembera mu divizoni bbirir zokka ku ttaano ezikola Kampala.
mt0: <pad> We have come to this today with the Democratic Party leading in only two of the five divisions that make up Kampala.</s>

en: Protazio Kintu is Local council three Chairman for Nakawa Division.
lug: Protazio Kintu ye ssentebe wa LC eyookusatu owa divizoni y'e Nakawa.
mt0: <pad> Protazio Kintu is the chairman of the 3rd LC of the division of Nakawa.</s>

en: The Democratic Party also leads three out of Kampala's eight parliamentary constituencies.
lug: Era Democratic Party ekulembera konsitituwensi ssatu zokka ku ezo omunaana ezikola Kampala mu Paalamenti ya Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Era Democratic Party is the only party to represent three of the eight constituencies in Kampala in the Ugandan National Assembly.</s>

en: The party has three Members of Parliament only in Kampala Central, Kawempe North and Kawempe South.
lug: Ekibiina kirina bammemba ba Paalamenti basatu bokka mu Kampala Central, Kawempe North ne Kawempe South.
mt0: <pad> The assembly consists of only three MPs in Kampala Central, Kawempe North and Kawempe South.</s>

en: Kampala district Democratic Party chairman, Vincent Mayanja, laments that the party is ceding ground to other parties in the city.
lug: Ssentebe wa Democratic Party mu Kampala, Vincent Mayanja, alina obweraliikirirvu nti ekibiina kye obuwagizi bugenze bukiggwako mu kibuga naddala wansi mu bantu nga beeyunira ebibiina ebirala.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party's president in Kampala, Vincent Mayanja, is concerned that his party's influence has been declining in the city and among the people as they join other political parties.</s>

en: Mayanja, like the Democratic Party Secretary General Nsubuga, claims they will take back Kampala.
lug: Mayanja nga ssaabawandiisi wa Democratic Party Nsubuga, nti Kampala bajja kumweddiza.
mt0: <pad> Mayanja, secretary general of the Democratic Party Nsubuga, said Kampala will be honouring him.</s>

en: They were carrying out primary elections while another Democratic Party group of Sam Lubega was electing their own flag bearers elsewhere.
lug: Bwe baali mu kamyufu k'abakulembeze ate akabinja ka bammemba ba Democratic Party akalala akaali kakulirwa Sam Lubega baali beerondera bo be baagala mu kifo ekirala.
mt0: <pad> When they were in the Executive Committee and the other group of members of the Democratic Party led by Sam Lubega were looking for their favorites in another position.</s>

en: Democratic Party will have candidates from the same party competing against each other for votes from the same supporters.
lug: Democratic Party ya kubeera n'abeesimbyewo ab'enjawulo nga beevuganya era nga basaba obululu mu balonzi be bamu.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party has had several different candidates running and asking for the vote from their own delegates.</s>

en: Democratic Party's trouble is not only Lubega's group.
lug: Emitawaana gya Democratic Party si kabinja ka Lubega kokka.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party is not just a party of Lubega.</s>

en: Erias Lukwago is the Kampala Central Member of Parliament.
lug: Erias Lukwago ye mubaka wa Paalamenti owa Kampala Central.
mt0: <pad> Erias Lukwago is a Member of the House of Commons for Kampala Central.</s>

en: Mao group held their elections for the Democratic Party Kampala Central flag bearer on August twenty eighth.
lug: Ekiwayi kya Mao kyakola okulonda okwakyo ku ani anaakwata bendera ya Democratic Party mu Kampala Central nga abiri mu munaana Ogwomunaana.
mt0: <pad> The Maoist Party voted on who will represent the Democratic Party in Kampala Central on August 8.</s>

en: Mayanja said the party pleaded with Lukwago to send his nomination application for Democratic Party's flag but he never did.
lug: Mayanja yagamba nti beegayirira Lukwago ateekeyo okusaba kwe okw'okukwatira Democratic Party bendera naye teyakikola.
mt0: <pad> Mayanja said they tried to convince Lukwago to accept his request to stand for the Democratic Party's flag but he refused.</s>

en: Lukwago said that he could not subscribe to one group of the party.
lug: Lukwago yagamba nti yali takkiriziganya n'oludda lw'ekibiina olumu.
mt0: <pad> Lukwago said he was not in agreement with the back of one party.</s>

en: He said he would only participate after the two groups have reconciled, which looks unlikely to happen.
lug: Yagamba nti yali wa kwetabamu ssinga ebiwayi byombi byali byegasse, ekintu ekiyinza obutabaawo.
mt0: <pad> He said he would have joined if both sides had agreed, which may not happen.</s>

en: Most likely Lukwago will join Forum for Democratic Change which has cultivated a strong opposition presence in and around Kampala.
lug: Obubonero obusinga bulaga nti Lukwago yandyegatta ku Forum for Democratic Change ekifunye obuwagizi obusinga mu by'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu kampala n'emiriraano.
mt0: <pad> Most signs suggest that Lukwago has joined the Forum for Democratic Change which has received a lot of support from the government-opposing opposition in Kampala and its environs.</s>

en: Initially Lukwago wanted to become the mayor of Kampala.
lug: Okusooka Lukwago yali ayagala kufuuka mmeeya wa Kampala.
mt0: <pad> Lukwago wanted to be the mayor of Kampala.</s>

en: He had been told that Parliament was set to pass the Kampala takeover bill when Members of Parliament returned from the recess.
lug: Yali akitegeddeko nti Paalamenti yali eteekateeka okuyisa ebbago ly'etteeka erifuga ekibuga Kampala ng'ababaka ba Paalamenti bavudde mu luwummula.
mt0: <pad> He had heard that the Parliament was preparing to pass the bill governing Kampala city when the parliamentarians returned from their summer recess.</s>

en: If that happens, he says, he will stand for Kampala Central Member of Parliament.
lug: Agamba nti ssinga ekyo kibaawo, ajja kwesimbawo ng'omubaka wa Kampala Central mu Paalamenti.
mt0: <pad> If that happens, he says he will run for the Central constituency of Kampala in the parliament.</s>

en: Democratic Party will have two candidates Lukwago and Yawe.
lug: Democratic Party ejja kubeera n'abeesimbyewo babiri okuli Lukwago ne Yawe.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party will have two representatives, Lukwago and You.</s>

en: This will give advantage to Forum for Democratic Change and National Resistance Movement candidates.
lug: Kino kyakuwa omukisa ababavuganya okuva mu Forum for Democratic Change ne National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> This allowed the Forum for Democratic Change and National Resistance Movement to challenge them.</s>

en: The Interparty Cooperation is now inviting National Resistance Movement losers.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina kati guyita abaagwa mu National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> The committee now includes the dead of the National Resistance Movement.</s>

en: Those troubled by National Resistance Movement's rigging machinery should join the cooperation in the "struggle for free and fair elections".
lug: Abo abakwatibwako engeri National Resistance Movement gye kibbamu obululu balina okwegatta ku mukago okulwanirira kaweefube ow'okuteekawo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.
mt0: <pad> those who have been affected by the National Resistance Movement's election fraud must join the movement to fight for the establishment of free and fair elections.</s>

en: The opposition seems to be attempting to seize the opportunity of the fights within National Resistance Movement.
lug: Abooludda oluvuganya balaga nga abataakozese mukisa guno ng'aba National Resistance Movement balwanagana.
mt0: <pad> The opposition party accuses the National Resistance Movement of not taking advantage of this opportunity to fight the government.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation told the press about the violence witnessed in the National Resistance Movement primary elections.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwategeezezza bannamawulire ku bikolwa eby'obumenyi b'wamateeka ebyeyolekedde mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> The National Resistance Movement's political committee has informed the press of the criminality that has occurred in the National Resistance Movement's headquarters.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation condemned the election violence and rigging.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwavumiridde okuyiwa omusaayi n'okubba obululu.
mt0: <pad> The political parties have accused each other of bloodshed and corruption.</s>

en: IPC chairman and presidential flag bearer Doctor Kizza Besigye says what happens in political parties is a matter of public concern.
lug: Ssentebe wa IPC era akwatidde omukago ogwo bendera Doctor Kizza Besigye agamba nti ebigenda mu maaso mu bibiina bikosa abantu ba bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> The president of the IPC and the holder of the flag, Dr Kizza Besigye, said that the political crisis in the conference affects the common people.</s>

en: It would be wrong for Inter Party Cooperation to keep quiet as National Resistance Movement spreads violence on its members in elections.
lug: Kikyamu omukago gw'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okusirika obusirisi nga National Resistance Movement esaasaanya obumenyi bw'amateeka ne ku bammemba baayo mu kulonda.
mt0: <pad> The National Resistance Movement was the first political party to use the legal system for its members in the election.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation punished the National Resistance Movement for involving the police and the army in its elections.
lug: Ekibiina ekigatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi kyabonolezza National Resistance Movement olw'okwetabya poliisi n'amagye mu byokulonda kwakyo.
mt0: <pad> The political coalition has dissolved the National Resistance Movement for its use of police and military force in its election.</s>

en: Besigye pointed out that police were assigned to deliver National Resistance Movement electoral materials.
lug: Besigye yagamba nti poliisi ye yaweebwa ogw'okubunya n'okutambuza eby'okulondesa mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> Besigye said the police were given the task of stealing and transporting explosives from the National Resistance Movement's base in Kyengera.</s>

en: Robert Isoke was detailed to monitor and investigate the alleged ballot stuffing in Kabarole district.
lug: Robert Isoke yaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa obw'okulondoola n'okunoonyereza ku kukukusa obululu mu disitulikiti y'e Kabarole.
mt0: <pad> Robert Isoke was given the responsibility of monitoring and investigating election fraud in Kabarole district.</s>

en: Besigye said these are clear cases of partisan behaviour that security forces are exhibiting which must stop.
lug: Besigye yagamba nti kano kabonero ak'enkukunala akalaga nti abakuumaddembe balina oludda lwe bakolera nga kino kirina okukoma.
mt0: <pad> Besigye said that this is a sign that the opposition has a role to play and that it must end.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation described these actions as criminal and called for prosecution of the culprits.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gwataputa ebikolwa bino kyabiyita bumenyi bw'amateeka era ne kisaba abeenyigira mu bikolwa bino bavunaanibwe.
mt0: <pad> The committee denounced these acts as criminal and demanded that the participants in these crimes be prosecuted.</s>

en: The violence in NRM primaries has given the Inter Party Cooperation reason to press for a new national Electoral Commission.
lug: Obujagalalo mu kamyufu ka NRM buwadde omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ensonga okuteesa nti wateekebwewo akakikiiko k'ebyokulonda ak'eggwanga akapya.
mt0: <pad> The crisis in the NRM leadership has given the inter-party political alliance the reason to call for the formation of a new national assembly.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation says the National Resistance Movement election mismanagement will show up into the national Electoral Commission.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gugamba nti okukwata obubi okulonda kwa National Resistance Movement kwa kulabikako mu kakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
mt0: <pad> The political committee says that the National Resistance Movement's election protest should be reported to the Electoral Commission.</s>

en: When Fufa's AGM convenes on August 20, Watson confirmed that necessary constitutional arrangements will be considered first on the agenda.
lug: Olukiiko lwa buli mwaka olwa Fufa bwe lwakakasibwa mu Gwomunaana nga 20, Watson yakakasa nti enteekateeka za ssemateeka ezeetaagisa ze zisooka okufiibwako ku binaagobererwa mu lukiiko.
mt0: <pad> When the annual meeting of the World Health Organization was announced on August 20, Watson assured that the necessary legislative measures were first to be adopted on the issues discussed at the meeting.</s>

en: By the time the new league season kicks off mid next month, Uganda Super league Limited is expected to be running things.
lug: Mu kiseera sizoni y'omupiira empya weenaatandikira wakati w’omwezi ogujja, Uganda Supper League Limited esuubirwa okuba nga y'eddukanya ebintu.
mt0: <pad> Uganda Supper League Limited is expected to be able to rectify the situation by the start of the new football season in mid-November.</s>

en: Jinja declared 2014 as the year of progress towards achieving the evaluation of professionalization of the Super League.
lug: Jinja yalangirira 2014 ng'omwaka gw'okugenda mu maaso okutuuka ku bw'okupima eddaala ly'ekikugu obwa Supper League.
mt0: <pad> Jinja announced 2014 as the year of progress towards the Super League title test.</s>

en: Magogo insists that what matters is to start somewhere so that challenges are handled as they manifest along the way.
lug: Magogo alemerako nti ekikulu kwe kubaako ne we batandikira ebizibu bye basanga bikolebweko nga bwe batambula.
mt0: <pad> Magogo added that the most important thing is to have a place where they can start and find problems that they can fix as they move.</s>

en: Denis Mbidde, a local football enthusiast believes that the new arrangement presents an opportunity for a fresh start.
lug: Denis Mbidde, omu ku bawagizi b’omupiira akkiriza nti entegeka empya ziwa omukisa gw'okutandika obuggya.
mt0: <pad> Denis Mbidde, one of the football fans believes that the new rules give the chance to start a war.</s>

en: Mbidde says that the new administration will give rise to a well shaped structure compared to the current set up.
lug: Mbidde agamba nti  obukulembeze obupya bujja kuteekawo ennambika ennungi bw'ogeraageranya kw'eriwo.
mt0: <pad> Mbidde says that the new administration will set good standards compared to the previous one.</s>

en: He explains that Fufa is currently overwhelmed by many responsibilities.
lug: Annyonnyola nti mu kiseera kino Fufa erina obuvunaanyizibwa bungi.
mt0: <pad> He explained that at the moment FUFA has many responsibilities.</s>

en: Fufa runs district football, first division, second division, women football, Uganda Cranes and Uganda Kobs.
lug: Fufa eddukanya emipiira gya disitulikiti, ekibinja ekisooka, ekibinja ekyokubiri, omupiira gw’abakyala, ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere enkulu, ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'ompiira gw'ebigere ey'abali wansi w'emyaka ekkumi n'omunaana.
mt0: <pad> FUFA runs the district, first division, second division, women's football, national senior football team and national junior football team.</s>

en: The fresh start that Mbidde dreams of is around the corner.
lug: Entandikwa empya Mbidde gy’alootako enaatera okutuuka.
mt0: <pad> The new beginning of the year is about to come.</s>

en: The Fufa Chief Executive Officer, Edgar Watson, is right.
lug: Akulira enzirukanya y'emirimu mu Fufa, Edgar Watson, mutuufu.
mt0: <pad> The Director of the Foreign Affairs Committee, Edgar Watson, is right.</s>

en: The ongoing painting exhibition by emerging artist James Sensalire came as no particular surprise to regular art observers.
lug: Omwoleso gw’okusiiga ogugenda mu maaso ogw’omusiizi James Sensalire tegwajja nga kyewuunyo eri abalabi b'ebissiige aba bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> James Senser's progressive writing style will not come as a surprise to regular readers of the art world.</s>

en: Sensalire claims that there are certain environmental features that are fast becoming extinct because of human activities.
lug: Sensalire agamba nti waliwo ebintu by’obutonde ebimu ebizzeewo olw’emirimu abantu gye bakola.
mt0: <pad> Sensalire says that there are some natural phenomena that have come about because of the human activities.</s>

en: There is always the aspect of African female dancers engaged in some kind of tribal dance.
lug: Bulijjo waliwo enkola y'abakyala abazinyi Abafirika abeeta mu mazina g’obuwangwa agamu.
mt0: <pad> Always there is a system of African women who dress in the name of certain cultural traditions.</s>

en: After finishing his studies at National Teachers College, Nkozi in 2002, Sensalire did not make any time to face the blackboards.
lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliririza emisomo gye ku National Teaches College, Nkozi mu 2002, Sensalire teyaddamu kusoma.
mt0: <pad> After finishing his teaching degree at National Teachers College, Nkozi in 2002, Senorite did not pursue any further education.</s>

en: He immediately got employed as an illustrator for a monthly catholic magazine called Leadership.
lug: Baamuweerawo omulimu ng'omusomesa mu katabo k'amawulire k'Obukatoliki akaafulumanga buli mwezi akayitibwa Leadership.
mt0: <pad> He was offered a job as a teacher at the monthly Catholic magazine Leadership.</s>

en: Martin Luther King said, " if a man has not discovered something he will die for, he is not fit to live".
lug: Martin Luther King yagamba nti singa omusajja aba talina ky'azudde ky'anaafiiririra, aba talina kubeera mulamu.
mt0: <pad> Martin Luther King said that if a man has nothing to die for, he should not be alive.</s>

en: Sensalire is passionate about wildlife and nature.
lug: Sensalire ayagala nnyo ebisolo by'omu nsiko n’obutonde.
mt0: <pad> Sensalire is very fond of the wild animals and nature.</s>

en: Blue sky international provides all types of vehicle servicing and repairs, genuine spare parts and general vehicle maintenance.
lug: Blue sky international ekola ku kuddaabiiriza emmotoka okw'ebika bwonna, ebyetaagisa ku mmotoka, ebyetaagisa ku motoka ebirungi ennyo, n'okwekebejja emmotoka yonna.
mt0: <pad> Blue sky international is a professional car repair company, car accessories, high-end car accessories and vehicle checks.</s>

en: The address of the contact person is;Director Evas Orland,Chief Mechanic; Yunusu Kabuya Workshop,P.O Box 27210,Kampala Uganda.
lug: Endagiriro y’omuntu atuukirwako eri: Director Evas Orland, Makanika omukulu: Edduuka Yunusu Kabuya A.K.P 27210, Kampala Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Contact: Director Evas Orland, Chief Executive Officer: Yusufu Kabuya Shop A.K.P 27210, Kampala Uganda</s>

en: Is Uganda People`s Congress pulling out of Inter-Party Cooperation?
lug: Uganda People’s Congress egenda kuva mu mukago ogutabaebibiina by'ebyobufuzi?
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress is to leave the inter-party political alliance.</s>

en: Doctor Salim Ahmed was the chairperson of the Commonwealth Observer Group for Rwanda's Presidential elections.
lug: Musawo Salim Ahmed ye yali ssentebe w'ekibinja ky'agaaliko amatwale ga Bungereza ekitunuulira okulonda k'obwapulezidenti mu Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Musawo Salim Ahmed was the chairman of the British electoral commission to monitor the presidential election in Rwanda.</s>

en: The National Resistance Movement election violence shows that the situation may get worse in 2011 when opposition joins the race.
lug: Obutabanguko mu kulonda kwa National Resistance Movement kulaga nti embeera eyinza kusajjuka mu 2011 ng'oludda oluvuganya lwegasse mu lwokaano.
mt0: <pad> The failure of the National Resistance Movement election showed that the situation could return to 2011 when the opposition party joined the protests.</s>

en: During the NRM internal elections, voting was scrambled in Sembabule where Lwemiyaga MP Ssekikubo battled Minister Sam Kutesa.
lug: Mu kulonda kw'omu kibiina kya NRM, okulonda kwali kwa kuzibu nnyo mu sembabule nga MP w'e Lwemiyaga Ssekikubo attunka ne minisita Sam Kuteesa.
mt0: <pad> In the NRM assembly election, there was a very difficult vote in the July as MP Lwemiyaga Ssekikubo fought with minister Sam Kuteesa.</s>

en: In Kapchorwa, violence erupted between supporters of Stephen Chebrot and MP Sabila.
lug: E Kapchorwa, obutabanguko bwabalukawo wakati w’abawagizi ba Stephen Chebrot n'aba MP Sabila.
mt0: <pad> In Kapchorwa, a clashes broke out between supporters of Stephen Chebrot and MP Sabila.</s>

en: In West Budama Minister Otala drew a gun at supporters of his opponent; in Kibale MP Tinkansimire's car was stoned.
lug: Mu West Budama Minisita Otala yatunuza emmundu mu bawagizi b’amuvuganya, e Kibale emmotoka y’omubaka Tinkansimire yakubwa amayinja.
mt0: <pad> In West Budama, Minister Otala bought arms from his opponents, in Kibale the car of MP Tinkansimire was broken into.</s>

en: In Kaliro, elections were cancelled twice over malpractices.
lug: E Kaliro, okulonda kwasazibwamu emirundi ebiri lwa bikolwa ebitakkirizibwa mu mateeka.
mt0: <pad> In Kaliro, the election was called off twice for illegal behavior.</s>

en: In Butaleja, the elections were cancelled after a mob attacked the organisers.
lug: E Butalejja, okulonda kwasazibwamu oluvannyuma lw'ekibinja ky'abatwalira amateeka mu ngalo okulumba abategesi.
mt0: <pad> In Uganda, the election was cancelled on Tuesday after a security force blocked the polling station.</s>

en: Forum for Democratic Changes's Musumba, described Mao's decision to meet Inter-Party Cooperation as an immature act to attract publicity.
lug: Musumba owa Forum for Democratic Change, yannyonnyola okusalawo kwa Mao okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ng'ekikolwa eky’ekito eky'okusasamaza abantu.
mt0: <pad> The Forum for Democratic Change, the leader of the Forum for Democratic Change, described Mao's decision to confront the meeting of the political parties as a "violent act of distraction" by the people.</s>

en: The Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly criticizing the Inter-Party Cooperation.
lug: Okukyuka kw’enneeyisa y’ekibinja kya Mao kwewuunyisa nnyo kubanga baali bavumirira omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu lwatu.
mt0: <pad> The change in Mao's behavior was very surprising because they had been opposing the establishment of political parties in our country.</s>

en: Musumba said, "We are not interested in getting involved in immature politics."
lug: Musumba yagamba nti bo si beetegefu kwetaba mu byabufuzi bya kito.
mt0: <pad> The mayor said that they were not ready to participate in this political process.</s>

en: Since President Kagame's election victory, the majority of Rwandans in and outside the country have been in festive mood.
lug: Okuva Pulezidenti Kagame bwe yawangula akalulu, Abanyalwanda abasinga wabweru ne munda we ggwanga babadde bajaguza.
mt0: <pad> Since President Kagame won the election, many Rwandans both in and outside the country have been wondering what he will do.</s>

en: The night election results were announced, scenes of jubilation on Televisions as many people in Amahoro stadium celebrated was appealing.
lug: Ekiro ebyava mu kulonda lwe byalangirirwa, ebifo ebijaguzibwa byalagibwa ku zi terefayina ng'abantu bangi mu kisaawe ky'e Amahoro bajaguza, byali bisanyusa.
mt0: <pad> When the results were announced yesterday, the voting stations were shown on television as many people in Peace Stadium voted, it was exciting.</s>

en: Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa that was Uganda's fifth president since independence, was a strong hearted freedom fighter and adventurous.
lug: Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa eyali pulezidenti wa Uganda owookutaano okuva ku meefuga, yali mulwanyi nnyo ow'eddembe era ow’omutima omugumu.
mt0: <pad> Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa, the fifth president of Uganda since the revolution, was a great advocate for peace and a very generous man.</s>

en: We were together in Uganda National Congress from 1956 up to early 1960 when we split due to internal disagreements.
lug: Twali ffenna mu Uganda National Congress okuva mu 1957 okutuuka ku ntandikwa ya 1960 bwe twayawukanya olw’obutakkaanya munda mu kibiina.
mt0: <pad> We were all in the Uganda National Congress from 1957 to the beginning of 1960 when we split up because of internal divisions in the assembly.</s>

en: Uganda National Congress, the party which spread the gospel of nationalism and fought for Uganda's independence was founded by six men.
lug: Uganda National Congress, ekibiina ekyabunya enjiri y'obwamwoyogwaggwanga era ne kirwanirira obwetwaze bwa Uganda kyatandikibwawo abasajja mukaaga.
mt0: <pad> Uganda National Congress, the body that declared independence and fought for the freedom of Uganda was founded by six men.</s>

en: Musazi was the founding President General and Abubaker Mayanja founding Secretary General.
lug: Musaazi ye yali pulezidenti ku ntandikwa ate Abubaker Mayanja ye yali ssaabawandiisi ku ntandikwa.
mt0: <pad> Musaazi was the president at first and Abubaker Mayanja was the secretary general at first.</s>

en: Binaisa's early life was adventurous.
lug: Obulamu bwa Binaisa nga muto bwali bunyuma.
mt0: <pad> The life of Jesus as a child was difficult.</s>

en: After Makerere University, he went to London without much financial support.
lug: Nga avudde ku ssetendekero y'e Makerere, yagenda e London nga talina bulingi nsimbi.
mt0: <pad> After graduating from the University of Cambridge, he went to London without any money.</s>

en: He raised tuition fees by digging graves in London.
lug: Yasobola okufuna ebisale ng'asima ntaana e London.
mt0: <pad> He managed to get a job as a waitress in London.</s>

en: This is what he used to tell us in Katwe in 1957 during our conversations about life.
lug: Bino bye yateranga okutugamba e Katwe mu 1957 nga tunyumya ku bulamu.
mt0: <pad> "This is what he would say to us in Katwe in 1957 when we were enjoying life."</s>

en: Mother Teresa said that the Chinese government could do something about it.
lug: Maama Teresa agamba nti Gavumenti ya China erina ky'eyinza okukikolako.
mt0: <pad> Mother Teresa said that the Chinese government can do something about the situation.</s>

en: This is not about their sovereignty in Tibet, this is about how their security forces behave.
lug: Kino tekiri ku buyinza bwabwe mu Tibet, kiri ku ngeri amagye gaabwe gye geeyisaamu.
mt0: <pad> This is not about their control of Tibet, it is about the way their troops act.</s>

en: Theary Seng, a Cambodian human rights lawyer, commented on the conviction of Kaing Guek Eav.
lug: Theary Senge, munnamateeka omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu mu Combodia yayogera ku Kaing Guek Eav okusingisibwa omusango.
mt0: <pad> Theary Senge, a Cambodian human rights lawyer and activist, said on Kaing Guek Eav's indictment.</s>

en: These people were not victimized in any way after the overthrow of Amin.
lug: Abantu bano tebaavunaanibwa mu ngeri yonna oluvannyuma lwa Amin okuggyibwako.
mt0: <pad> These people were not charged in any way after Amin was removed.</s>

en: But there was evidence against them that they aided Amin in Killing Uganda People's Congress members.
lug: Naye waaliwo obukakafu obulaga nti baayambako Amin mu kutta ba mmemba ba Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> But there were evidences that they helped Amin kill members of the Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: Let Kahigiriza come here and contradict my words if what I say is not correct.
lug: Leka Kahigiriza ajje awakanye ebigambo byange bwe biba nga si bituufu.
mt0: <pad> Let the teacher come and refute my words if they are not true.</s>

en: Muwanga requested then to take the message to Buzabo and all the Democratic Party supporters to stop the dirty politics immediately.
lug: Muwanga yabasaba batwale obubaka ewa Buzabo n'abawagizi ba Democratic Party bonna balekeraawo ebyobufuzi eby'emivuyo mu bunnambiro.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga asked them to pass on the message to Buzabo and all supporters of the Democratic Party that they should abandon the politics of violence in the name of the people.</s>

en: The liberty which was brought by the Uganda People's Congress cost people's lives some died in Lake Victoria, others between Mutukula and Arua.
lug: Eddembe eryaleetebwa Uganda People's Congress lyaviirako abantu okufiirwa obulamu bwabwe nga abamu baafiira mu nnyanja Nalubaale ate abalala wakati wa Mutukula ne Arua.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress brought the peace that resulted in the loss of lives of people, some in the Lake Nalubaale and others between Mutukula and Arua.</s>

en: They sacrificed their lives for the freedom of everyone in Uganda.
lug: Bawaayo obulamu bwabwe ku lw'eddembe lya buli munnayuganda
mt0: <pad> They sacrificed their lives for the freedom of every Ugandan.</s>

en: Muwanga warned that members of different parties should not claim to have an upper hand on others by molesting them.
lug: Muwanga yalabula nti bammemba b'ebibiina eby'enjawulo tebalina kulaga nti basinga abalala nga babakozesaako eryanyi.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga warned that members of different political parties should not try to show that they are superior by using power to manipulate others.</s>

en: Muwanga talked to the Uganda people's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.
lug: Muwanga yayogera eri aba Uganda People's Congress e Mbirizi, mu konsitituwensi ya Masaka South-West.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga spoke to the Uganda People's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.</s>

en: The 65 year old chairman who effectively participated in last years' liberation war which removed Amin was among the speakers.
lug: Ssentebe ow'emyaka 65 eyeetaba ennyo mu lutalo lw'ameenunula olw'omwaka oguwedde olwaggyako Amin era yali omu ku boogezi.
mt0: <pad> The 65-year-old Senator was active in the last year's reconstruction war that killed Amin, and was one of the speakers.</s>

en: The youth of Uganda People's Congress will spearhead the reconstruction and development task.
lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja ku kulemberamu omulimu gw'okuddamu okuzimba n'emirimu gy'enkulaakulana.
mt0: <pad> The youth of the Uganda People's Congress will lead the reconstruction and development work.</s>

en: The first thing the Uganda People's Congress will do as soon as it comes to power will be to engage the youth in productive work.
lug: Ekintu Uganda People's Congress ky'enaasokera ddala okola ng'eze mu buyinza kwe kwetabya abavubuka mu mirimu egifuna.
mt0: <pad> The main thing the Uganda People's Congress will be focused on doing when it comes to power is to engage young people in productive jobs.</s>

en: Uganda People's Congress youths will spearhead this so as to set an example to the rest.
lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja kukulemberamu kino okusobola okulaga ekyokulabirako eri abalala.
mt0: <pad> The Ugandan Young People's Congress will lead this to set a good example for others.</s>

en: Muwanga also appealed to Ugandans to strive hard and establish mutual respect for each other.
lug: Muwanga era yasaba Bannayuganda okulwana ennyo okuwangana ekitiibwa.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga also urged the Ugandans to fight hard to win the respect.</s>

en: At Bwezibwera, the chairman pledged, never again shall the Uganda People's Congress allow Uganda to be humiliated as it was in the Amin's days.
lug: E Bwezibwera, ssentebe yeeyama nti Uganda People's Congress tejja kuddamu kukkiriza bannayuganda kutulugunyizibwa nga bwe kyali mu biseera bya Amin.
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, the president promised that Ugandans will not be subjected to the same kind of oppression as they were under Amin's rule.</s>

en: Never shall Uganda be characterized with the life of scarcities of essential commodities.
lug: Uganda teribeera mu mbeera ya bbulwa lya bintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> Uganda does not suffer from shortages of basic necessities.</s>

en: Uganda People's Congress needs determined characters who would stand with this nation even in difficult times.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaaga abantu abamalirivu abajja okuyimirirawo n'eggwanga lino ne mu biseera ebizibu.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress needs people who can stand with the country even in difficult times.</s>

en: Commenting on the Democratic Party led by Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, he said it was characterized by contradictions.
lug: Okwogera ku Democratic Party ekulemberwa Paulo Kawanga Ssemwogerere, agamba nti kyali kijjudde okwetema engalike.
mt0: <pad> About the Democratic Party led by Paul Kawanga Ssemwogerere, he said it was full of political corruption.</s>

en: He commended Semogerere for his ability to lead a party that was almost torn apart by contradictions.
lug: Yasemba Ssemwogerere olw'obusobozi bwe okukulembera ekibiina kumpi ekitaagudwataagudwa olw'okwetema engalike.
mt0: <pad> He ended up being praised for his ability to lead a group that was nearly undisturbed by the lack of a leadership.</s>

en: The Democratic Party, the serious contender with the Uganda People's Congress in the polls, had given away more than 10 parliamentary seats.
lug: Democratic Party esinga okuvuganya Uganda People's Congress mu kulonda okujja yali eviiriddwako ebifo bw'obwa mmemba bwa paalamenti ebisoba mu 10.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party, the main competitor in the upcoming Uganda People's Congress election, was denied the seats of parliamentary assembly that were missing from the parliament.</s>

en: Otherwise, how can we have the 1980 parliamentary candidates who cannot fill in the forms and present them in time?
lug: Ekitali ekyo, tuyinza tutya okuba n'ababaka ba paalamenti eya 1980 abatasobola kujjuza mpapula ne baziwaayo mu budde?
mt0: <pad> Like that, how can we have 1980 parliamentarians who couldn't fill in the paper and hand it over in time?</s>

en: This series is compiled and reproduced by John Njoroge.
lug: Obutundu buno bugattidwa ne bufulumizibwa John Njoroge.
mt0: <pad> The segment was written and produced by John Njoroge.</s>

en: According to the independent on Jul 30- August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire reported that a young woman in Soroti was raped while returning home.
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire agamba nti omukyala e Soroti yasobozebwako ng'adda ewaka.
mt0: <pad> According to the Independent of 30 July to 5 August, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire says that a woman in Soroti was threatened when she was returning home.</s>

en: The 28 year old Grace Nakasi, a victim of an insurgency in eastern Uganda, was pulled off the road to the bush and gang-raped by the men in uniform.
lug: Grace Nakasi ewemyaka 28, eyakosebwa mu kino ekyali mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda, yasikibwa okuva ku kkubo n'asobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja abaali mu yunifoomu.
mt0: <pad> Grace Nakasi, 28, who was raped in the incident in eastern Uganda, was dragged from the road and attacked by a group of men dressed in uniforms.</s>

en: I was living in Soroti town.
lug: Nali mbeera mu kibuga Soroti.
mt0: <pad> I lived in Soroti.</s>

en: I met nine soldiers on patrol at about seven o'clock in the evening.
lug: Nasisinkana abasirikale mwenda ku ppatulo ku ssaawa nga emu ey'olweggulo.
mt0: <pad> I met all the officers at the front desk at about 11:00.</s>

en: Nakasi begins her story by narrating how they all raped her and abandoned her by the roadside.
lug: Nakasi atandika emboozi ye ng'anyumya engeri bonna gye baamusobyako ne bamuleka ku mabbali g'ekkubo.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi begins his story by telling how everyone abused him and left him on the side of the road.</s>

en: This was 1987, a year after President Yoweri Museveni had captured power and announced a fundamental change.
lug: Kino kyali mu 1987, nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni ng'azze mu buyinza n'alangirira enkyukakyuka ey'omuggundu.
mt0: <pad> It was 1987, when President Yoweri Museveni came to power and declared a radical transformation of the country.</s>

en: One year later, Nakasi received information that her parents had been killed by rebels.
lug: Nga wayise omwaka gumu, Nakasi yafuna obubaka nti bazadde be baali battiddwa abayeekera.
mt0: <pad> One year later, Nakasi received a message that his parents had been killed by their landlords.</s>

en: Nakasi narrated to us how she decided to go to the bus park to take a bus to visit her home.
lug: Nakasi yatuttottoledde bwe yasalawo okugenda mu ppaaka ya bbaasi afune bbaasi agende ewaabwe.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi was confused when he decided to go to the bus stop to get a bus home.</s>

en: It was on the way to the bus park that Nakasi became a victim of the second rape.
lug: Nakasi bwe yali agenda mu ppaaka ya bbaasi, yasobezebwako omulundi ogwokubiri.
mt0: <pad> When Nakasi was going to the bus stop, he was followed for the second time.</s>

en: Nakasi met four National Resistance Army soldiers, two of them dragged her off the road and forced themselves on her.
lug: Nakasi yasisinkana abasirikale ba National Resistence Army bana, ababiri ku bo ne bamusika ku kkubo ne bamwekakaatikako.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi met four National Resistance Army soldiers, two of whom were walking down the road and asked him to join them.</s>

en: There was a meeting with Ugandan women's groups under the support of the Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange during the AU summit.
lug: Waaliwo olukiiko lw'ekibiina ky'abakyala abannayuganda nga bawagirwa Women's international cross-cultural Exchange mu lukungaana lwa AU.
mt0: <pad> The Ugandan Women's Union has held a meeting to discuss the Women's international cross-cultural Exchange at the AU Conference.</s>

en: The Africa Union Summit took place in Kampala the capital city of Uganda.
lug: Olukungaana lwa African union lwali mu Kampala, ekibuga ekikulu ekya Uganda.
mt0: <pad> The African Union Conference was held in Kampala, the capital of Uganda.</s>

en: Nakasi a mother of 12 children, a resident of Soroti, was raped 16 times, infected with HIV and later thrown out of her marital home by the husband.
lug: Nakasi nga maama w'abaana 12, mutuuze w'e Soroti, yasobezebwako emirundi 16, n'asiigibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya oluvannyuma omwami we n'amugoba mu maka ge.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi, a 12-year-old mother of 12 children, was abused 16 times and left in poverty, then her husband moved her out of his home.</s>

en: It's a touching narrative and a wider reflection of the tribulations women face in Africa's conflict-torn regions.
lug: Mboozi ekwasa ennaku n'okwefumiitiriza ebizibu abakyala bye baayitamu mu Afirica mu bitundu ebitaaguddwataaguddwa entalo.
mt0: <pad> The dresses are a day of reflection and celebration of the difficulties women have faced in Africa in the conflict-affected regions.</s>

en: She is one of the faces of Ugandan women that carry the burden of sexual violence.
lug: Y'omu ku bakyala ba Uganda abaali basobezeddwako.
mt0: <pad> She was one of the Ugandan women who were being investigated.</s>

en: For the past decade, Uganda has been applauded on the world stage as a successful story in the fight against the Human immunodeficiency Virus.
lug: Mu kyasa ekiyise, Uganda yaasiimibwa ku ddaala ly'ensi yonna okubeera ng'ekoze bulungi mu kulwanyisa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> Last year, Uganda was praised on the world stage for its success in tackling poverty.</s>

en: Women who were harrased by the Lord's Resistance Army rebels have been affected by HIV more than any other women in the rest of the country.
lug: Abakazi abaakabassanyizibwa abayeekera ba Lord's Resistance Army basiigidwa nnyo akawuka akaleeta mukenenya okusinga abakazi abalala bonna mu ggwanga.
mt0: <pad> The women who were taken hostage by Lord's Resistance Army were more affected by the disease than any other woman in the country.</s>

en: The sexual violence by both the Lord Resistance Army and government soldiers has left behind a traumatized and stressed generation of women.
lug: Resistance Army n'abajaasi ba gavumenti okukabassanya abakyala kirese omugigi gw'abakyala omwennyamivu era ogutalina mirembe.
mt0: <pad> The violence of the Resistance Army and government vehicles against women has made the women's movement a martyrdom and unsafe haven.</s>

en: In 1990, Nakasi was again gang-raped by men whom she believes were government soldiers.
lug: Mu 1990, Nakasi yaddamu okusobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja baasuubira nti baali basirikale ba gavumenti
mt0: <pad> In 1990, Nakasi was again attacked by a group of men who he thought were government soldiers.</s>

en: She was admitted to Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after the rape incident.
lug: Yaweebwa ekitanda mu ddwaliro lya Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital mu Kampala okumala emyezi egiwera oluvannyuma lw'okusobezebwako.
mt0: <pad> He was admitted to the Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after being neglected.</s>

en: In 2002, Nakasi took an HIV test.
lug: Mu 2002, Nakasi yakeberebwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> In 2002, Nakasi was diagnosed with a terminal illness.</s>

en: But the day I told him I had tested HIV positive, he threw me out of the house, Nakasi narrates in a tone of courage that has defied many odds.
lug: Nakasi attottola mu ddoboozi ery'obuvumu eryewunyisa buli omu nti, olunaku lwe yamugamba nti yali azuulidwamu akawuka akaleeta mukenenya, yamugoba mu nnyumba,
mt0: <pad> The day he told him that he was being treated for AIDS, he threw him out of the house.</s>

en: Nakasi was excommunicated from the community.
lug: Nakasi yasosolwa mu kitundu.
mt0: <pad> The damage was cleaned up in the area.</s>

en: A ray of hope emerged in 2007.
lug: Essuubi lyatuukawo mu 2007
mt0: <pad> Hope came to the world in a time of hopelessness.</s>

en: Nakasi was rescued by World Vision International which paid for her operation to remove her uterus which helps eliminate the fistula condition.
lug: Nakasi yaanunulwa World Vision International abaasasulira okulongosebwa kwe okumuggyamu nnabaana ekyamuyamba okuwona ekikulukuto.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi was adopted by World Vision International who paid for his surgery to remove his eyeballs which helped him see the world through a new lens.</s>

en: After the treatment, she and other women, who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.
lug: Oluvanyuma ly'okujjanjabibwa, ye n'abakazi abalala abaakabassanyizibwa, baatandikawo ekibiina ekiyambi ekiyitibwa Teso Peace Women's Activists.
mt0: <pad> After treatment, she and other victims started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.</s>

en: Nakasi's story is heartbreaking.
lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi emenya omutima.
mt0: <pad> The voice of Nakasi touches the heart.</s>

en: According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote an article about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafuluma nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi yawandiika emboozi ekwata ku bakyala n'abawala abasuuliddwawo oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwako.
mt0: <pad> According to the Independent published on 30 July to 5 August 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote an essay about four women and girls who were killed after being sexually abused.</s>

en: Nakasi said the young girl's parents died in the war and now at nine no one wants to take care of her yet has six orphans under her care.
lug: Nakasi agamba nti abazadde b'omuwala baafiira mu lutalo era kati ku myaka mwenda tewali n'omu ayagala kumulabirira kyokka ng'alina bamulekwa mukaaga b'alabirira.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi says that the girl's parents died in the war and she is now five years old and has no one to look after her.</s>

en: Nakasi's story is not unique in Uganda's war-ravaged communities.
lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi si mpya mu bitundu bya Uganda omwali entalo.
mt0: <pad> The voice of Nakasi is not new in the areas of Uganda where war has been raging.</s>
