lug: Masetera oluvannyuma yafuuka omuwabuzi ku byokwerinda ow'eyaliko pulezidenti wa South Africa, Thabo Mbeki.
mt0: <pad> Masetera became the security advisor to the former South African president, Thabo Mbeki.</s>

en: The two fell out over allegations that Masetera was secretly enhancing the power of Mbeki's main rival and current president, Jacob Zuma.
lug: Ababiri baalemagana oluvannyuma lw'ebigambibwa nti Masetera nti yali ayongedde amaanyi mu mulabe wa Mbeki asingayo era Pulezidenti aliko, Jacob Zuma.
mt0: <pad> The two clashed after reports that Masetera had gained influence with Mbeki's biggest rival and current president Jacob Zuma.</s>

en: Masetera's relationship with Karegyeya became stronger as, he now claims, presidents tend to use and dump their intelligence chiefs.
lug: Enkolagana ya Masetera ne Karegyeya yeeyongera nga bw'agamba kati, nti bapulezidenti batera okukozesa abakulira obukessi ate bwe bamala ne babasuulawo.
mt0: <pad> The friendship between Masetera and Karegyeya grew as he said that presidents often use cabinet ministers for their own gains and then throw them out.</s>

en: What was Museveni's game plan in this Kayumba saga?
lug: Museveni yalina ntekateeka ki ku bino ebyatuuka ku Kayumba?
mt0: <pad> What did Museveni have for you about Kayumba?</s>

en: As top Rehabilitation Project Force officials pondered this issue, "a friend" from the American Central Intelligence Agency called Kigali.
lug: Abakulira pulojekiti y'okuddaabiriza balowooza nnyo ku nsonga eno, "Owoomukwano" okuva mu  American Central Intelligence Agency ayitibwa Kigali.
mt0: <pad> The planners of the exposure project thought a lot about this, "A Friend" from the American Central Intelligence Agency is called Kigali.</s>

en: He claimed that Kayumba had sent a message to Museveni seeking contact.
lug: Yategeeza nti Kayumba yali asindikidde Museveni obubaka ng'asaba bakolagane.
mt0: <pad> He said Kayumba had sent a message to Museveni asking for cooperation.</s>

en: Francis Gakwerera says he lives in Mozambique where he has been running a business since two thousand five.
lug: Francis Gakwerera agamba nti abeera mu Mozambique gy'abadde addukanyiza bizinensi okuva mu enkumi bbiri mu etaano.
mt0: <pad> Francis Gakwerera says he lives in Mozambique where he has been doing business since the 1980s.</s>

en: However, whenever I am travelling between Maputo and Kigali, I travel through South Africa.
lug: Wabula, buli lwe mbeera ntambulira wakati wa Maputo ne Kigali, mpitira mu South Africa.
mt0: <pad> But, every time I travel between Maputo and Kigali, I stop in South Africa.</s>

en: I also buy things from South Africa which I sell in Mozambique.
lug: Era ngula ebintu e South Africa bye ntunda e Mozambique.
mt0: <pad> I buy things in South Africa and sell them in Mozambique.</s>

en: How did you get arrested in relation to shooting Kayumba?
lug: Wajja otya okukwatibwa ku byekuusa ku musango gw'okukuba Kayumba amasasi?
mt0: <pad> How do you get arrested in connection with the shooting of Kayumba?</s>

en: I was in South Africa in transit to Maputo.
lug: Nali mu South Africa nga ngenda Maputo.
mt0: <pad> I was in South Africa going to Maputo.</s>

en: I had some business to do in South Africa and also to find a place in a boarding school for my child.
lug: Nalina bizinensi ey'okukola mu South Africa n'okufuna ekifo ky'omwana wange mu ssomero ly'ekisulo.
mt0: <pad> I had a business in South Africa and got my son a place in the spring school.</s>

en: I use South Africa for many things.
lug: Nkozesa South Africa mu bintu bingi.
mt0: <pad> I use South Africa in many things.</s>

en: I arrived Wednesday and was arrested on Saturday.
lug: Nnatuuka ku Lwokusatu ne nkwatibwa ku Lwomukaaga.
mt0: <pad> I arrived on Wednesday and was arrested on Friday.</s>

en: The police accused me of being the person who shot Kayumba.
lug: Poliisi yanvunaana ogw'okubeera omuntu eyakuba Kayumba amasasi.
mt0: <pad> Police have accused me of being the person who shot Kayumba Nyamwasa.</s>

en: Do you know Kayumba and do the two of you have historical wrangles?
lug: Omanyi Kayumba era mwembiriri mubadde n'obukuubagano okuva edda?
mt0: <pad> You know Kayumba and you've had a long association with him.</s>

en: I first met Kayumba in Kitgum in one thousand eighty-seven when he was the Assistant District Administrator.
lug: Nasooka kusisinkana Kayumba e Kitgum mu lukumi kinaana mu musanvu bwe yali akola nga amyuka akulira disitulikiti.
mt0: <pad> I first met Kayumba in Kitgum in 1987 when he was working as deputy governor of the district.</s>

en: I was a sergeant in the nineteenth Battalion of the National Riffle Association which is currently call Uganda Peoples Defence Force.
lug: Nali ssajenti mu kibinja ky'abayeekera eky'ekkumi n'omwenda ekya National Riffle Association leero ekiyitibwa Uganda People's Defence Force.
mt0: <pad> I was a sajent in the ninth regiment of the National Riffle Association, now known as the Uganda People's Defence Force.</s>

en: In 1990 we shifted together to Gulu.
lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda twadda ffenna e Gulu.
mt0: <pad> In 1799 we all returned to Gulu.</s>

en: On 1st October 1990, we drove in the same motor vehicle to Kagitumba when the Rehabilitation Project Force was launching the struggle.
lug: Nga I Ogwekkumi 1990, twatambulira mu mmotoka emu okugenda e Kigitumba nga Rehabilitation Project Force etongoza olutabaalo.
mt0: <pad> In June 1990, we traveled in the same car to Kyitumba as the Rehabilitation Project Force launched a relief operation.</s>

en: Low returns in the photographic film industry, for instance, are the result of a superior substitute product as Kodak and Fuji.
lug: Okufuna ekitono mu bya ffirimu, okugeza, olw'okubaawo ebintu ebirala ebirungi ebiyinza okweyambisibwa nga Kodak ne Fuji.
mt0: <pad> For example, finding a discount in film, because there are other good options available from Kodak and Fuji.</s>

en: After making giant strides in a series of highly successful projects in Mozambique, Lebanon, Morocco and Ethiopia, CinemArena is finally in Uganda.
lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okukozesebwa obulungi mu pulojekiti ezaatambula obulungi Mozambique, Lebanon, Morocco ne Ethiopia, ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu kimaze ne kituuka mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> After being well used in projects in Mozambique, Lebanon, Morocco and Ethiopia, the fibre station has now arrived in Uganda.</s>

en: CinemArena in Uganda is doing its rounds in social transformation, thanks to the Italian cooperation and Amakula Film.
lug: Ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu mu Uganda kyetooloolera ku kukyusa mbeera z'abantu, okusiima kugende eri Italian cooperation ne Amakula Film.
mt0: <pad> The film festival in Uganda is about changing the lives of people, thanks to Italian cooperation and Amakula Film.</s>

en: So excited are the locals in Gulu, where the project is currently operating that they not only move considerable distances to the chosen locations.
lug: Musanyufu nnyo n'abantu b'e Gulu pulojekiti gy'eddukanyizibwa nti tebakoma bukomi ku kutambula ngendo mpanvu okugenda mu bifo bye baagala.
mt0: <pad> I'm very happy with the people of Gulu project that they no longer have to travel long distances to go where they want to go.</s>

en: The locals in Gulu brave the cold of the night till as late as midnight.
lug: Abantu b'e Gulu bavumu mu obunnyogovu bw'ekiro okutuukira ddala mu matumbi budde.
mt0: <pad> Gulu people went to bed at the same time as the sun rises.</s>

en: CinemArena is an initiative funded by the Embassy of Italy Development Cooperation office.
lug: Ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu kivujjirirwa ekitebe kya Italy Development Cooperation office.
mt0: <pad> The exhibition is organized by the Italian Development Cooperation office.</s>

en: A traveller caravan travels around rural and remote areas of Uganda.
lug: Emmotoka y'abasuubuzi etambula yeetooloola ekibuga n'ebitundu by'ekyalo mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> A commercial bus moving around the city and rural areas of Uganda.</s>

en: The traditional Acholi dancers that entertain the crowds through the day's programme add a good flavour to the mix.
lug: Abazinyi abazina amazina Amacholi basanyusa abantu ku nnaku ez'okukola bongera okunyumisa ekintu.
mt0: <pad> The actors of the movie, known as the Choli, entertain people on the days of work and make it more enjoyable.</s>

en: The organisers of the project say that their communication medium is kin to Barak Obama's "Yes We Can" campaign slogan that saw him rise to office.
lug: Abategesi ba pulojekiti bagamba nti omukutu gwabwe ogw'empuliziganya gwekuusa ku ngombo ya Baraka Obama eya "Yes We Can" eyamuyamba okutuuka mu woofiisi.
mt0: <pad> The creators of the project say that their radio ad is based on Barack Obama's "Yes We Can" campaign that helped him get into office.</s>

en: Marco Ballerini, the project manager said that doing so will equip people with skills that will lead to future developments.
lug: Marco Ballerini, akulira pulojekiti yagambye nti mu kukola ekyo abantu abalina obukugu bajja kukulemberamu enkulaakulana y'omu maaso.
mt0: <pad> Marco Ballerini, the project director said that by doing so the best people will be able to lead the future development of the city.</s>

en: The project that is to happen in over twenty sub-counties in Gulu district started on June twenty-fifth and ends on July twenty-fifth.
lug: Pulojekiti egenda okukolebwa mu magombolola agasukka amakumi abiri mu disitulikiti y'e Gulu yatandika nga abiri mu ttaano Ogwomukaaga era ya kukomekkerezebwa ng'abiri mu ttaano Ogwomusanvu.
mt0: <pad> The project to be built in over 20 villages in Gulu district began in June and will be completed in July.</s>

en: The locals in Gulu communities where the project is currently happening are so excited.
lug: Abantu b'omu bitundu by'e Gulu pulojekiti gyeeri mu kukolebwa kati basanyufu nnyo.
mt0: <pad> The people of Gulu where the project is being made are very happy.</s>

en: They pointed out that some of their colleagues were integrated into the Uganda People's Defense Force.
lug: Baanokolayo nti abamu ku bannaabwe baayingizibwa eggye lya Uganda People's Deforce Force.
mt0: <pad> They also said that some of their friends were recruited into the Uganda People's Defence Force.</s>

en: Others were attached to various security agencies helping operational networking, and sensitization of the Moslem community.
lug: Abalala baalina ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda bye baalinako akakwate ebyabayambanga okulondoola n'okumanyisa Abasiraamu.
mt0: <pad> Some had a joint security service that was responsible for monitoring and informing Muslims.</s>

en: Two Allied Democratic Forces members Kakooza Ahmad and Dada Mukibi were denied loan access.
lug: Bammemba ba Allied Democratic Forces babiri, Kakooza Ahmad ne Dada Mukibi bammiddwa looni.
mt0: <pad> Two members of the Allied Democratic Forces, Kakooza Ahmad and Dada Mukibi were killed.</s>

en: The office of Arrest Search Surveillance and Tracking at Kitante which played a role in liaising ADF networking was no longer operational.
lug: Woofiisi ekola ku kunoonyereza n'okulondoola e Kitante eyali ekola ku kutabaganya enkola za ADF yali tekyakola.
mt0: <pad> The former Kante Office of Investigation and Monitoring that was responsible for coordinating the activities of the ADF was no longer operational.</s>

en: In the process of working for the government, their lives have been increasingly put at risk by fellow Allied Democratic Forces still in the bush.
lug: Mu kukola ne Gavumenti, obulamu bwabwe bubadde bwongedde okuteekebwa mu katyabaga okuva eri bannaabwe ba Allied Democratic Forces abakyali mu nsiko.
mt0: <pad> While working with the government, their lives were put at risk by their Allied Democratic Forces comrades who were still in the field.</s>

en: They talked about the untimely death of their colleagues like Lyavaala, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.
lug: Baayogera ku kufa kw'ekibwatukira okwa bannaabwe nga Lyavaale, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.
mt0: <pad> They talk about the deaths of their friends like Lyavaale, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.</s>

en: Some of their colleagues were mysteriously killed and some former Allied Democratic Forces rebels warned of a return to terror activities.
lug: Abamu ku bannaabwe battibwa mu ngeri etaategeerekeka era abamu ku baaliko abayeekera ba Allied Democratic Forces baatiisatiisa okuttukiza ebikolwa y'obutujju.
mt0: <pad> Some of their friends were killed in mysterious ways and some of the former Allied Democratic Forces threatened to bring down the crimes.</s>

en: In October 2008 heads of security agencies met to discuss the issue of former ADF rebels who were accusing the government of using them.
lug: Mu Gwekkumi gwa 2008, abakulira ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda baasisinkana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'abaliko abayeekera ba ADF balumiriza gavumenti okubakozesa.
mt0: <pad> In October 2008, security chiefs met to discuss the issue of the ADF rebels accusing the government of using them as a tool.</s>

en: Former Allied Democratic Forces rebels accused the government of using them and dumping them without pay.
lug: Abaaliko abayeekera ba Allied Democratic Forces baalumizizza gavumenti okubakozesa n'ebasuulawo nga tebasasudde.
mt0: <pad> The Allied Democratic Forces accused the government of using them and their weapons without their consent.</s>

en: The July 11 terror bombings in Kampala were attributed to the joint network of ADF and Somalia based Al-Shabaab Islamic militants.
lug: Obulumbanyi bwa bbomu obwali mu Kampala nga 11 Ogwomusanvu bwava ku nkolagana wakati wa ADF ne bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu aba Al-Shabaab abasangibwa e Somalia.
mt0: <pad> The July 11 bomb blast in Kampala was the result of a coordination between the ADF and the Somali Islamist group Al-Shabaab.</s>

en: Because of the harsh and miserable living conditions, some desperate Allied Democratic Forces reporters have been lured back into the rebel activities.
lug: Olw'embeera enzibu era ey'okwennyamira gye bawangaaliramu, bannamawulire ba Allied Democratic Forces abatamanyi kiddako baddiziddwa mu bikolwa by'obutujju.
mt0: <pad> Because of the difficult and desperate conditions in which they were captured, Allied Democratic Forces journalists who did not know what had happened were later implicated in crimes of aggression.</s>

en: Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe and others are some of the former members of the Allied Democratic Forces.
lug: Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe n'abalala be bamu ku baali bammemba ba Allied Democratic Forces.
mt0: <pad> Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe and others were members of the Allied Democratic Forces.</s>

en: The Independent of July 2010 reports that the deceased ADF family members are not getting support and yet their husbands died while on state duty.
lug: Independent w'Ogomusanvu, 2010, yawandiika nti abooluganda b'abaaliko mmemba wa ADF tebafuna buyambi kyokka ng'abaami baabwe baafiira ku mirimu gya Gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> The Independent in July 2010, wrote that the families of former members of the ADF not only received support for their men who died on government jobs but also received support for their children.</s>

en: Kampala City Council Authority is always emphasizing cleanliness among residents of Kampala.
lug: Kampala City Council Authority lubeerera ekubiriza bannakampala okuba abayonjo.
mt0: <pad> The Kampala City Council Authority is continuing to urge the people of Kampala to be clean.</s>

en: The move has landed their colleagues like Rwigyema Shafik and Tumusiime Hassan in problems.
lug: Ekino kiviiriddemu bannaabwe nga Rwigyema Shafik ne Tumusiime Hassan ebuzibu.
mt0: <pad> This caused problems for their friends like Rwigyema Shafik and Tumusiime Hassan.</s>
